AddProfilePermission.name: AddProfilePermission
AddProfilePermission.description: Grants permission to add cross-account permissions to a Signing Profile

CancelSigningProfile.name: CancelSigningProfile
CancelSigningProfile.description: Grants permission to change the state of a Signing Profile to CANCELED

DescribeSigningJob.name: DescribeSigningJob
DescribeSigningJob.description: Grants permission to return information about a specific Signing Job

GetSigningPlatform.name: GetSigningPlatform
GetSigningPlatform.description: Grants permission to return information about a specific Signing Platform

GetSigningProfile.name: GetSigningProfile
GetSigningProfile.description: Grants permission to return information about a specific Signing Profile

ListProfilePermissions.name: ListProfilePermissions
ListProfilePermissions.description:
Grants permission to list the cross-account permissions associated with a Signing
                                                Profile

ListSigningJobs.name: ListSigningJobs
ListSigningJobs.description: Grants permission to list all Signing Jobs in your account

ListSigningPlatforms.name: ListSigningPlatforms
ListSigningPlatforms.description: Grants permission to list all available Signing Platforms

ListSigningProfiles.name: ListSigningProfiles
ListSigningProfiles.description: Grants permission to list all Signing Profiles in your account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags associated with a Signing Profile

PutSigningProfile.name: PutSigningProfile
PutSigningProfile.description: Grants permission to create a new Signing Profile

RemoveProfilePermission.name: RemoveProfilePermission
RemoveProfilePermission.description: Grants permission to remove cross-account permissions from a Signing Profile

RevokeSignature.name: RevokeSignature
RevokeSignature.description: Grants permission to change the state of a Signing Job to REVOKED

RevokeSigningProfile.name: RevokeSigningProfile
RevokeSigningProfile.description: Grants permission to change the state of a Signing Profile to REVOKED

StartSigningJob.name: StartSigningJob
StartSigningJob.description: Grants permission to initiate a Signing Job on the provided code

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a Signing Profile

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a Signing Profile
